subdisciplines.name: Climate Change Economics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how human activities affect the climate and how policies and economic incentives can be used to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

subdisciplines.name: Natural Resource Economics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how we use natural resources and how to manage them to ensure their long-term sustainability.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Valuation
subdisciplines.description: The study of how to put a monetary value on environmental goods and services that are not traded in markets, in order to inform policy decisions.
